channel.title: Windmills - BSJ
channel.description:
It’s been a crazy journey! Just a few weeks ago I surpassed 50,000 plays! I want to say thank you to all of those who gave me a chance to let my tunes reach them. Thank you.
So here’s to the future. I am BSJ, a producer. Vibes are my goal. Auxy’s my tool. Your enjoyment is my motivation.
https://soundcloud.com/brad-saint/windmills

item.title: Windmills - BSJ
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
Dude. Congrats on 50k. That’s a LOT of plays. You deserve it though bro. Awesome stuff
